english.segment1: The broken, weary and poor. Finding..You are the cure. The weak and dying, glorifying, You in it all..
english.segment2: Its the song of the beautiful, Jesus Loves Me.. Its the song of the beautiful, Jesus Saved Me.. The song of the redeemed, the echoes of those made free, Its the song of the beautiful, Jesus Loves Me..
english.segment3: The fallen back on their feet. The fatherless now complete.. The innocent suffering, rising from wounding, to find..You were there all along!
english.segment4: Its the song of the beautiful, Jesus Loves Me.. Its the song of the beautiful, Jesus Saved Me.. The song of the redeemed, the echoes of those made free -. Its the song of the beautiful, Jesus Loves Me..
english.segment5: Oh how He loves me. Oh how He loves me. Oh how He love me.. The broken, the beautiful..
english.segment6: The prodigal running home.. The widow never alone.. The one who is waiting, rising and singing, You..Jesus, You Are My All!
